    • 方法详细资料

      • convertToMutable

        public static android.graphics.Bitmap convertToMutable(android.content.Context context,
                                                       android.graphics.Bitmap inBitmap)
        Change a bitmap to mutable.
        参数:
        context -
        inBitmap - The bitmap need to change
        返回:
        if success, return a mutable bitmap, others return the old bitmap.

      • getBitmapSize

        public static BitmapUtils.Size getBitmapSize(java.lang.String url)
        Get bitmap size, width and height.
        参数:
        url -
        返回:

      • getBitmapSize

        public static int getBitmapSize(android.graphics.Bitmap bitmap)
        Get the size in bytes of a bitmap.
        参数:
        bitmap -
        返回:
        size in bytes

      • toRoundCorner

        public static android.graphics.Bitmap toRoundCorner(android.graphics.Bitmap bitmap,
                                                    int ratio)
        Make a round corner bitmap
        参数:
        bitmap - Source bitmap.
        ratio - Corner radius ratio of Diameter accounting. when it's value is 2, the bitmap which returned is a circle.
        返回:
        the round corner bitmap. null if input bitmap is invalid.
